title: 2015년 Rodgers, Elton Wade 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Rodgers, Elton Wade. 판결일: 2015-10-07. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Rodgers, Elton Wade
**판결일**: 2015-10-07
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

             IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS
                         OF TEXAS
                                         NO. WR-83,876-01


                      EX PARTE ELTON WADE RODGERS, Applicant


                  ON APPLICATION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS
                  CAUSE NO. 11-00321 IN THE 235TH DISTRICT COURT
                              FROM COOKE COUNTY


        Per curiam.

                                              ORDER

        Pursuant to the provisions of Article 11.07 of the Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, the

clerk of the trial court transmitted to this Court this application for a writ of habeas corpus. Ex parte

Young, 418 S.W.2d 824, 826 (Tex. Crim. App. 1967). Applicant was convicted of indecency with

a child by contact and sentenced to five years’ imprisonment. He did not appeal his conviction.

        Applicant contends, among other things, that his trial counsel rendered ineffective assistance

because he misadvised Applicant about the meaning of his nolo contendere plea, leading him to

believe there would still be an adversarial test of the evidence. The habeas record contains no record

of admonishments, no judicial confession, no response from counsel, and no findings of fact.

        Applicant has alleged facts that, if true, might entitle him to relief. Strickland v. Washington,
                                                                                                       2

466 U.S. 668 (1984); Ex parte Patterson, 9...
